English: Full Blood Moon... Was it today?
Tee hee,
I feel like doing something extraordinary tonight!
(A few moments later)
Lei... Ah, no, Lewisia. What's this about...?
Hm hm. Just call me Lei, Gau. No matter what, I am Lei, too.
O-okay. Then, I'll call you L-Lei like I used to do.
Fine.
An invitation, Lewisia? What's this about? And we have a young Barbarian friend here.
You sending an invitation. Now I have seen everything.
Phillop, Pavel. Glad to see you.
(Dwarf King and Wizard of Ice Dragon...)
Am I the last to arrive, Lewisia?
Welcome, Lorraine.
(Sage of the Forest...)
It's been a long time, Lewisia.
It occurred to me on my way here that your birthday is around this time of year.
Lei's Birthday...!
Yes. Today is the day that I can see the Blood Moon.
I guess living among humans for so long is bringing out the human side of me.
I suddenly felt the urge to receive well wishes for my birthday like other humans.
It's funny that you wanted to experience a human tradition,
but there is only one human here, this young one, among the people you invited. Hahaha!
*Chuckle* Gau means something special to me.
When I was staying at the orphanage for a while, I saw Gau take good care of the kids on their birthdays.
I.. It's an honor for me, just to be with the heroes who saved the world.
Hahaha... What a pure soul you are. I can sense the blessing of the Ice Elementals from you.
Uh... Umm...
He is just a young boy who has a long way to go.
Why don't we start the celebration now?
Oh, right.
On behalf of the Elves and spirits of the Forest, congratulations to the ruler of pure red.
*Sigh* Lorraine, please keep the formal tone for formal events.
You're making the mood all awkward.
Oh, I didn't mean it...
Then, I'll keep it casual. Happy birthday, Lewisia. This is for you.
It's a collection of dewdrops that contains the energy of young elementals. It will help with your Mana recovery.
Hahaha. Lorraine thought the same thing that I did.
I thought a Mana Stone with pure Mana energy would be a good present for Lewisia, so I brought one.
Congrats, Lewisia. Take this.
Congratulations. This is a snow crystal filled with Mana of Ice Dragons.
I don't think I'll need to explain its value.
Ah... Umm... I couldn't prepare a gift, but happy birthday, Lei.
They knew me and when my birthday was because they're old friends.
I did not invite you expecting a gift. There's no need for you to worry about it.
I just wanted to celebrate like you humans do.
But...
I'll remember your birthday and make sure to bring a nice gift for you on your next birthday!
*Chuckle* Sounds fair. Thank you for your kind words.
Now, let's get started with the birthday party. Enjoy the night, and help yourself!
Mirianne!
Mirianne!
Umm... Where did she go?
(Bump!)
Mirianne?
Oops. Oh, Sonia!
Why are you in such a rush?
Ah, Grandpa. Did you see Mirianne?
Mirianne?
Umm... I have no idea.
Hmm... Okay. Thanks, Grandpa!
This isn't the type of thing I should to use my power for, but...
... (Buzz)
...Found it. The electric reaction from Mirianne's magical dagger...
It's this way.
Umm? What is this bottle?
*Cough, cough* What's this powder?
I think I know what this might be... Eh, Mirianne must be pulling a prank on me.
Let's go again...
Urgh...! (Buzz)
What is this powder? It's interrupting the signal detection!
Detection won't work, at least for a little while...
Umm? A note?
She's lured!
Hahaha! It was worth the effort, collecting powder from Yanadis!
Now that she can't use detection, I wonder how she'll find me!
Mirianne... Playing hide-and-seek, all of a sudden? What are you thinking?
Well, whatever.
You hide, I'll seek.
I can't use detection, so I should use another way.
Found you, Mirianne!
...Ehhh? This quickly? How did you...?
Have you forgotten?
I have this ring on me!
Aww, that's cheating!
There is no such thing as cheating in hide-and-seek.
I caught you, Mirianne. So I win, right?
...Haha.
Nope! I won!
Sonia! Happy birthday!
Sonia, sweetheart, happy birthday! / Happy birthday, Sonia!
You were always out traveling around this time of year, so the kids didn't get to celebrate for your birthday.
They wanted to give you a big celebration this year.
Mirianne did a good job distracting you while we were preparing.
Good work, Mirianne!
*Giggle* Thank you, Grandpa!
Playing hide and seek with her was a lot of fun.
...Thank you.
